rules.ruleString: Any 4 (I/W) co-req units in {AZA4420, AZA4430, AZA4445, AZA4480}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}

description: The aim of the unit is to enhance students' research competencies and to promote an in-depth understanding of a particular area of interest. By incorporating three distinct but interdependent modules: Research Design and Analysis (RDA); Research Ethics and Research Project, this unit will promote an integrated approach to advancing students' research competencies.
